3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\rest;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
6 use Ubiquity\cache\ClassUtils;
7 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
8 use Ubiquity\exceptions\RestException;
9 use Ubiquity\log\Logger;
10 use Ubiquity\utils\http\URequest;
11 
21 class RestServer {
26  protected $config;
27  protected $headers;
28  protected $tokensFolder;
29  protected $tokenLength;
30  protected $tokenDuration;
31  protected $tokensCacheKey = "_apiTokens";
32  protected $allowedOrigins;
33 
38  protected $apiTokens;
39 
40  public function __construct(&$config, $headers = null) {
41  $this->config = $config;
42  $this->headers = [ 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' => '*','Access-Control-Allow-Credentials' => 'true','Access-Control-Max-Age' => '86400','Access-Control-Allow-Methods' => 'GET, POST, OPTIONS, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, HEAD','Content-Type' => 'application/json; charset=utf8' ];
43  if (is_array ( $headers )) {
44  $this->headers = array_merge ( $this->headers, $headers );
45  }
46  }
47 
53  public function connect() {
54  if (! isset ( $this->apiTokens )) {
55  $this->apiTokens = $this->_loadApiTokens ();
56  }
57  $token = $this->apiTokens->addToken ();
58  $this->_addHeaderToken ( $token );
59  return [ "access_token" => $token,"token_type" => "Bearer","expires_in" => $this->apiTokens->getDuration () ];
60  }
61 
67  public function isValid() {
68  $this->apiTokens = $this->_loadApiTokens ();
69  $key = $this->_getHeaderToken ();
70  if ($this->apiTokens->isExpired ( $key )) {
71  return false;
72  } else {
73  $this->_addHeaderToken ( $key );
74  return true;
75  }
76  }
77 
78  public function _getHeaderToken() {
79  $authHeader = $this->_getHeader ( "Authorization" );
80  if ($authHeader !== false) {
81  $headerDatas = explode ( " ", $authHeader, 2 );
82  if (sizeof ( $headerDatas ) === 2) {
83  list ( $type, $data ) = $headerDatas;
84  if (\strcasecmp ( $type, "Bearer" ) == 0) {
85  return $data;
86  } else {
87  throw new RestException ( "Bearer is required in authorization header." );
88  }
89  } else {
90  throw new RestException ( "The header Authorization is required in http headers." );
91  }
92  } else {
93  throw new RestException ( "The header Authorization is required in http headers." );
94  }
95  }
96 
97  public function finalizeTokens() {
98  if (isset ( $this->apiTokens )) {
99  $this->apiTokens->removeExpireds ();
100  $this->apiTokens->storeToCache ();
101  }
102  }
103 
104  public function _getHeader($header) {
105  $headers = getallheaders ();
106  if (isset ( $headers [$header] )) {
107  return $headers [$header];
108  }
109  return false;
110  }
111 
112  public function _addHeaderToken($token) {
113  $this->_header ( "Authorization", "Bearer " . $token, true );
114  }
115 
116  public function _loadApiTokens() {
117  return $this->getApiTokens ()->getFromCache ( CacheManager::getAbsoluteCacheDirectory () . \DS, $this->tokensCacheKey );
118  }
119 
120  protected function getApiTokens() {
121  if (! isset ( $this->apiTokens )) {
122  $this->apiTokens = $this->newApiTokens ();
123  }
124  return $this->apiTokens;
125  }
126 
132  protected function newApiTokens() {
133  return new ApiTokens ( $this->tokenLength, $this->tokenDuration );
134  }
135 
136  protected function getAllowedOrigin() {
137  $http_origin = URequest::getOrigin ();
138  if (is_array ( $this->allowedOrigins )) {
139  if (array_search ( $http_origin, $this->allowedOrigins ) !== false) {
140  return $http_origin;
141  }
142  return 'null';
143  }
144  return '*';
145  }
146 
147  protected function setAccessControlAllowOriginHeader() {
148  $origin = $this->getAllowedOrigin ();
149  unset ( $this->headers ['Access-Control-Allow-Origin'] );
150  \header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin: ' . $origin, true );
151  }
152 
153  protected function addOtherHeaders() {
154  foreach ( $this->headers as $k => $v ) {
155  $this->_header ( $k, $v );
156  }
157  }
158 
165  public function _header($headerField, $value = null, $replace = null) {
166  if (! isset ( $value )) {
167  if (isset ( $this->headers [$headerField] )) {
168  $value = $this->headers [$headerField];
169  unset ( $this->headers [$headerField] );
170  } else
171  return;
172  }
173  \header ( trim ( $headerField ) . ": " . trim ( $value ), $replace );
174  }
175 
181  public function _setContentType($contentType = null, $charset = null) {
182  $value = $contentType;
183  if (isset ( $charset ))
184  $value .= "; charset=" . $charset;
185  $this->_header ( "Content-type", $value );
186  }
187 
188  public function cors() {
189  $this->setAccessControlAllowOriginHeader ();
190  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials' );
191  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Max-Age' );
192  if ($_SERVER ['REQUEST_METHOD'] == 'OPTIONS') {
193  if (isset ( $_SERVER ['HTTP_ACCESS_CONTROL_REQUEST_METHOD'] ))
194  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods' );
195 
196  if (isset ( $_SERVER ['HTTP_ACCESS_CONTROL_REQUEST_HEADERS'] )) {
197  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers', $_SERVER ['HTTP_ACCESS_CONTROL_REQUEST_HEADERS'] );
198  } else {
199  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers', '*' );
200  }
201  Logger::info ( "Rest", "cors exit normally", "Cors" );
202  }
203  $this->addOtherHeaders ();
204  }
205 
206  public static function getRestNamespace() {
207  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
208  $controllerNS = $config ["mvcNS"] ["controllers"];
209  $restNS = "";
210  if (isset ( $config ["mvcNS"] ["rest"] )) {
211  $restNS = $config ["mvcNS"] ["rest"];
212  }
213  return ClassUtils::getNamespaceFromParts ( [ $controllerNS,$restNS ] );
214  }
215 
221  public function setAllowedOrigin($address = '*') {
222  if ($address !== '*') {
223  $this->allowedOrigins = [ $address ];
224  } else {
225  $this->allowedOrigins = [ ];
226  }
227  }
228 
234  public function setAllowedOrigins($addresses) {
235  $this->allowedOrigins = $addresses;
236  }
237 
243  public function addAllowedOrigin($address) {
244  $this->allowedOrigins = [ $address ];
245  }
246 
251  public function setTokenLength($tokenLength) {
252  $this->tokenLength = $tokenLength;
253  }
254 
259  public function setTokenDuration($tokenDuration) {
260  $this->tokenDuration = $tokenDuration;
261  }
